## Download

### Binary Packages
- Linux x86_64: [opencode-tg-linux-amd64.tar.gz](https://github.com/anomalyco/opencode-tg/releases/download/v{{VERSION}}/opencode-tg-linux-amd64.tar.gz)
- Linux ARM64: [opencode-tg-linux-arm64.tar.gz](https://github.com/anomalyco/opencode-tg/releases/download/v{{VERSION}}/opencode-tg-linux-arm64.tar.gz)
- macOS Intel: [opencode-tg-darwin-amd64.tar.gz](https://github.com/anomalyco/opencode-tg/releases/download/v{{VERSION}}/opencode-tg-darwin-amd64.tar.gz)
- macOS Apple Silicon: [opencode-tg-darwin-arm64.tar.gz](https://github.com/anomalyco/opencode-tg/releases/download/v{{VERSION}}/opencode-tg-darwin-arm64.tar.gz)

### Source Code
- Complete source: [opencode-tg-src.tar.gz](https://github.com/anomalyco/opencode-tg/releases/download/v{{VERSION}}/opencode-tg-src.tar.gz)

### Verify Integrity
```bash
sha256sum -c checksums.txt
```
